product_name: Bogs Plimsoll Prince of Wales Mid Rain Boots - Women's
long_description: The women's waterproof Bogs Plimsoll Prince of Wales Mid Rain Boots feel like sneakers on your feet but offer the warmth and waterproof protection you want on cold, wet winter days.
